mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT_BOARD (PBO_SEQ, USER_ID, PBO_TITLE, PBO_CONTENT, PBO_REGDATE, PBO_PROGRESS, PBO_DELFLAG) VALUES( 'PROJECTBOARD_' || PROJECTBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cliNm}, #{cliNm}, #{cliNm}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{cliNm}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT PBO_SEQ, USER_ID, CASE PBO_DELFLAG WHEN 'Y' THEN '삭제된 글입니다' ELSE LPAD(' ', PBO_DEPTH * 10) || PBO_TITLE END AS PBO_TITLE, PBO_REGDATE, PBO_REF, PBO_STEP, PBO_DEPTH, PBO_DELFLAG FROM PROJECT_BOARD ORDER BY PBO_REF DESC, PBO_STEP ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT_BOARD SET PBO_STEP = PBO_STEP + 1 WHERE PBO_REF = (SELECT PBO_REF FROM PROJECT_BOARD WHERE PBO_SEQ = #{id}) AND PBO_STEP > (SELECT PBO_STEP FROM PROJECT_BOARD WHERE PBO_SEQ = #{id})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT_BOARD (PBO_SEQ, USER_ID, PBO_TITLE, PBO_CONTENT, PBO_DEPTH, PBO_REF, PBO_STEP, PBO_DELFLAG, PBO_REGDATE) VALUES('PROJECTBOARD_' || TO_CHAR(PROJECTBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'FM000'), #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, (SELECT PBO_DEPTH FROM PROJECT_BOARD WHERE PBO_SEQ = #{parentId}) + 1, (SELECT PBO_REF FROM PROJECT_BOARD WHERE PBO_SEQ = #{parentId}), (SELECT PBO_STEP FROM PROJECT_BOARD WHERE PBO_SEQ = #{parentId}) + 1, 'N', SYSDATE)
